Reviews.Title: I couldnt get it to work properly
Reviews.Author: Nicole Marks
Reviews.Content: It did not work properly, I am sending it back as we speak, should be getting there at any time

Reviews.Title: i like it very much
Reviews.Author: Tammy Sharp
Reviews.Content: .I like it but having trouble downloading from playstore.  Would like to know why I keep getting an error. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Not capable
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tablet for business purposes and cannot download many of the apps needed for my business.  I've sent in a return request and I received info about the keyboard not the tablet.  This was definitely my first disappointing purchase from amazon.There is also a front camera which I completely misunderstood.  I take pictures of my products and services, not myself and there's no way to look thru a lens on the back of the camera to use the front camera. Didn't  get that feature at all!Finally, too much of a delay in changing screens, even with the best wifi or data connection.  Very disappointed!

ProductInfo.Features:
Google Play Store
Capacitive Touchscreen Tablet
G-Sensor
ProductInfo.Name: 9" Android Capacitive Touchscreen Tablet (with 8GB Memory Card) Features Google Play Store, Skype, YouTube, Netflix, Camera, Wifi, and G-Sensor!
